tweets.text: Unfortunately @PHE_uk and @EnvAgency not interested in women‚Äôs health if you‚Äôre from #newcastleunderlyme Pregnant women suffering, women in labour giving birth whilst being poisoned by noxious gas from #whalleysquarry #StopTheStink #TalkWomensHealth

Utterly embarrassing to confess that I live somewhere that becomes engulfed with a cloud of faeces most days,I literally cringe when I tell people. The Shame‚Äôs on You @RedIndustries2 @EnvAgency @Cap_it_off #stopthestink https://t.co/pgPPCZh9gp

@janepursey @ChrisGPackham @EnvAgency @ClintonDevon @kiergroup @NESouthWest @WiseBirding You've never actually looked at what HS2 do then? If you had you'd know that all trees with nests are left until the birds have left. They all get marked and they come back after nesting season to complete the job!

@SianieRoo @NewsNBC @EnvAgency @Cap_it_off @DefraGovUK @StinkStopthe @MPGeorgeEustice @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA Yes I agree. The process toward this is well underway here and is for the council‚Äôs professional officers to pursue free from political interference they might harm their case. As for the EA, I will along with @AaronBell4NUL be ensuring they are held to account for their failures
It never ends does it? The relentless morale-beating that comes from living in a country with an environmental protection body as broken as the @EnvAgency https://t.co/K2Ub0hL4vc

Absolutely - @EnvAgency backing planning application for such a huge development in the countryside is shameful. Try actually protecting the #environment @EnvAgency instead of huge quarries and waste incinerators. Many people value the countryside around here for what it is now. https://t.co/hnTxaUiZ6a

Did you know that you should register your Septic Tank with NRW? The free service helps us make sure systems are suitable for the location, maintained and aren‚Äôt causing pollution. Find out more and how to register.

tweets.text:
@EnvAgency 
INR: 1851979
9th March 2021

With only 5mm of rain recorded in last 13 days, pollution at the end of this septic tank system is clearly visible now the clean groundwater ingress dilution has temporarily ceased.

Brown to the right is normal soil pushed out by a mole https://t.co/e41AfAHBVh

@EnvAgency we have reported a human waste pollution incident from a neighbours septic tank on two occasions. We have yet be contacted by one of your environmental officers. This incident is hazardous to us and our 3 small children. Expecting an immediate response.

@PHE_uk @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgency @SimonTagg @AaronBell4NUL @DefraGovUK @BorisJohnson #StopTheStink it‚Äôs not better it‚Äôs worse someone has the ability to close this place down, stop feeding us lies and just do it this is a major issue landfills been closed for less before https://t.co/4mW34Ihnmn

Vegetation clearance starts from tomorrow. A very short visit this am incl: nest building Whitethroat, territorial Cetti's/Reed Warbler & Reed Bunting. Video shows how farcical this is! Still time to see sense @EnvAgency @kiergroup @Natures_Voice @Bucktonbirder  PLEASE RETWEET https://t.co/Tve0B6o4va

@Samanth33412592 @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgency @SimonTagg @AaronBell4NUL @Cap_it_off Keep pushing and fighting! Log everything with your GP, log all complaints in email and be prepared to engage solicitors as this is where we are at now. There is a long road still ahead of us

tweets.text: This is about the "Environment Agency" clearing habitat full of breeding birds, including priority & specially-protected species. Excuse seems to be that they've budgetary deadlines to meet. Anyone who's had misfortune to deal with @EnvAgency will know this is par for the course. https://t.co/q2nzBKvYxb

@scottdegg @StinkStopthe @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 It very much feels like @ClareDinnisEA was sent here last week against her wishes as a PR exercise in the face of national news coverage showing @EnvAgencyMids in a very bad way. The months of hiding away in an ivory tower was the easy option which it looks like she has resumed!

No update from @EnvAgencyMids after capping deadline @RedIndustries2 Walleys Landfill?The stink has been horrendous over the weekend,EA  email complaint mailbox not functioning,the odour‚Äôs not been mitigated,it‚Äôs still out of control-failure on failure @StinkStopthe #stopthestink

@EnvAgencyMids How long does it actually take to analyse a water sample? It‚Äôs been over 5 weeks and we still don‚Äôt know what was leaking out of the burst pipe at Walley‚Äôs Quarry. No wonder we are where we are with the landfill if this is how slow you work. #stopthestink https://t.co/6GAXvXYTQk

@Samanth33412592 @EnvAgency @RedIndustries2 @SimonTagg @AaronBell4NUL @DefraGovUK @StinkStopthe @Cap_it_off Not if we've got anything to do with it. We will fight them every inch of the way ‚úä‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è

Basically the issue is @EnvAgency can‚Äôt afford to pay for the finishing if they were to close @RedIndustries2 down, so they expected us to live with landfill gas tell 2026 they need holding accountable @SimonTagg @AaronBell4NUL @DefraGovUK @StinkStopthe @Cap_it_off #AirPollution https://t.co/ym8CKAmjgu

Children should smile because life is good, not because someone gave them an air purifier !!! @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids @ClareDinnisEA @DefraGovUK @JamesBevanEA @DJAndyMoor @carolecadwalla @BBCPanorama @StinkStopthe #stopthestink

This is despicable and totally unacceptable
We are seeing more examples of wanton wildlife crimes by the day and you should be protecting nature https://t.co/zj9SSrlkdN

Save our Souls ! The landfill gases are filling my home. We‚Äôve had one night off in 5& even then I‚Äôm not convinced I wasn‚Äôt nose blind to it as I had a sore throat in the morning.

@ChrisGPackham @EnvAgency @ClintonDevon @kiergroup @NESouthWest @WiseBirding Thank you for highlighting this (and happy birthday btw). Does our regulatory and enforcement laws need to be more robust as it seems to me that this area is weak where loopholes are exploited.

@ChrisGPackham @EnvAgency @ClintonDevon @kiergroup @NESouthWest @WiseBirding Shame on the Environment Agency. One minute these Government related bodies are telling us to look after our natural surroundings and the next they approve this sort off thing.
